Text: RE CalPx CEO Candidate Resumes Cc Folks I am sending at Howards request The Search Subcommittee Rich Stevens Howard and myself has performed the initial screening and concluded that Coffman Jermaine and Robert Mosier deserve your serious attention on Friday after the weekly OCPC meeting Shirmoammadi Rodriguez and Pope did not make the cut The plan is to conclude the OCPC meeting no later than Friday take a short minute break to get organized and allow telephone attendees to get a quick bite to eat and resume at with three quickhitting actionpacked minute interviews of Coffman Jermaine and Mosier I am attaching a scoring template to aid your notetaking and deliberations It is our intention to make a decision on Friday afternoon that will result in a firm offer going out Mosier was a late entrant and his resume is available for your inspection at his workout company website wwwmosiercocom Mosier may be on travel on Friday necessitating a callin to the Committee The Search Subcommittee would be grateful if you could arrange your schedule on Friday afternoon to permit your active participation in the interviews and deliberations Marc could you have your staff setup and reserve a second conference call beginning at Thanks jim crossen APX Original Message From Jim James Crossen Sent Thursday November AM To Cc Subject CalPx CEO Candidate Resumes Importance High OCPC PRIVATE PROPRIETARY CONFIDENTIAL Folks attached are the only resumes received as of close of business last night Please preview or have handy for a possible discussion at todays regular meeting Other than receipt acknowledgement no followup action has been taken jim crossen APX File RNC resume doc File Resume Eduardo A Rodriguezdoc File HWPope biodoc File DOJ Resume doc
